long_description: AAA section of Nmon, contains many useful configuration information about systems
BBB section of Nmon, contains many useful configuration information about systems
nmon_helper.sh shell script output, this scripts is responsible for Nmon raw data generation
nmon2csv Python / Perl scripts output, reponsible of Nmon raw data conversion into csv files consummed by Splunk
nmon_cleaner Python / Perl scripts, removing of Nmon raw files and csv data cleaning
